text:
21.4. Supervised Learning Data Representation 433
Each window is also associated with a speciﬁc activity. A given window of data may have
multiple variables, such as the x, y, and z axes of an accelerometer sensor. Let’s make this
concrete with an example. We have sensor data for 10 minutes; that may look like:
x, y, z, activity
1.1, 2.1, 0.1, 1
1.2, 2.2, 0.2, 1
1.3, 2.3, 0.3, 1
...
Listing 21.1: Example of contrived sensor data and associated activity.
